name: Classic Extensions and Infill
description: Classic lashes are the perfect way to enhance your natural lashes. One individual lash is added to each natural lash in a 1:1 application to create a set of longer and thicker lashes. Depending on the look you desire, Classic Lashes are available in a wide range of lengths, thicknesses and curls

name: Russian Lashes and Infill
description: Russian Lashes are created using individual lash extensions that have been formed into fans and are then applied to the natural lashes, creating a more dramatic look than classic lashes

name: Volume Lashes and Infill
description: Volume Lashes are a specialised technique where fanned extensions are applied to your natural lash. I'm using fans of 8 lashes called 8D to create volume

name: Hybrid Lashes and Infill
description: A Hybrid Lash treatment is a combination of volume and individual lashes, taking the best bits from both treatments. Hybrid lashes will give you volume and length resulting in a wispy, textured lash look

name: LVL - Lash Lift & Tint
description: LVL Lash Lift & Tint is the stunning alternative to eyelash extensions. This low maintenance, natural-looking treatment will give your natural lashes a beautiful lifted look, longer appearance and lasts up to 6 weeks requiring minimal aftercare

name: Bottom Lash Tint
description: Bottom Lash Tint enhances your bottom lashes, giving your eyes a fuller more vibrant look

name: Eyelash Removal
description: Application of a specialised remover to dissolve adhesive holding the extensions
